snippet: Hip-hop royalty, including 50 Cent, Russell Simmons and Busta Rhymes, attended a service for Chris Lighty, a manager who committed suicide last Thursday.
abstract: Hip-hop royalty, including 50 Cent, Russell Simmons and Busta Rhymes, attended a service for Chris Lighty, a manager who committed suicide last Thursday.

headline.main: Hip-Hop Stars Gather for Funeral of Famed Manager
